org.apache.storm.cassandra.context

Class WorkerCtx

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.storm.cassandra.context.WorkerCtx
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CassandraContext

    public class WorkerCtx
extends Object
implements Serializable

    Simple class used to register singletons within a storm worker.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getWorkerBean

        public <T,K,V> T getWorkerBean(Class<T> clazz,
                               Map<K,V> topoConf,
                               boolean force)

        Return an instance, which is shared (within a Worker), of the specified type.

        Parameters:
        clazz - the class of the bean.
        topoConf - the storm configuration
        force - if true= create a new instance even if one already exist.
        Returns:
        a instance of type T.
